department.dept_long_name: Department of African and African American Studies

course.title: Junior Tutorial - African Studies
course.faculty_text: Ingrid Monson and members of the Department
course.description: Students wishing to enroll must petition the Director of Undergraduate Studies for approval, stating the proposed project, and must have the permission of the proposed instructor. Ordinarily, students are required to have taken some coursework as background for their project.
course.prerequisites: Completion of African and African American Studies 11, or a substitute course approved by the Director of Undergraduate Studies.
